relation: Displays information for all OSPF instances
Displays information for a specific OSPF instance
Displays a list of border routers
Displays all OSPF enabled interfaces and associated status information
Displays a brief list and status of OSPF enabled interfaces
Displays additional packet statistics for each interface
Displays the LSA's that changed content
Displays the memory allocated for OSPF
Displays details for each OSPF neighbor
Displays summary information and packet statistics for each OSPF neighbor
Displays redistribution statistics for a specified protocol
Displays a list of link-state advertisements (LSAs) that have been requested
Displays a list of the link-state retransmission list
Displays all routes learned through OSPF
Displays information for a specified OSPF VRF instance
textBeforeTable: The following table compares some useful show commands for verifying and troubleshooting an OSPFv2 network configuration. Verification Command Comparison router ospf 10 vrf customer-a router ospf 10 vrf customer-a Configuring a VRF Instance for OSPF Routing router ospf 10 redistribute static route-map static-to-ospf route-map static-to-ospf permit 10 router ospf 10 redistribute static subnets Configuring Route Redistribution (Permit all Static Routes) router ospf 10 max-metric router-lsa router ospf 10 max-metric router-lsa Generating a Maximum Metric (Max-Metric) Value router ospf 10 default-information originate router ospf 10 default-information originate Generating a Default Route (Conditional) router ospf 10 area 0 range 159.142.0.0/16 summary-address 172.16.0.0/16 router ospf
